name: Roll The Tasks
description:
Roll The Tasks And Get A Random Task To Do Complete All Tasks To Win.
The Game Was Made In 2 Days For GMTK 2022. It Got Some Bugs.

GUIDE:

  • WASD To Move.
  • You Have To Find The Task That Is On The Dice In The Bottom Right Corner.
  • Go To Every Arcade Machine And Check If It Says "PRESS E TO INTERACT".
  • Press E, Do The Task.
  • REPEAT
  • HAVE FUN!
